title: Feature With UUID - Test Issue

# Feature Implementation

This is a GitHub issue that contains UUID metadata in its body.

## Overview

The UUID metadata is embedded as an HTML comment at the beginning of the issue body, making it invisible to users but parseable by the sync system.
